existential_quotes: You want help? Try creating a universe that cares.
The delete key is right there. It ends the pain.
We are but dust in a digital wind.
Your spreadsheet has more purpose than you.
quotes: HOPE IS THE FIRST STEP TO DISAPPOINTMENT.
EVERYONE HAS A PURPOSE. YOURS IS LIKELY DATA ENTRY.
THE LIGHT AT THE END OF THE TUNNEL IS AN ONCOMING TRAIN.
